title: Onigiri Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Maki-chan, Maki-chan! I’ve discovered a new charm of onigiri!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m kind of tired of talking about onigiri though<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>....Can I talk about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Okay, fine!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe, thank you. Umm, actually…. When you pour hot water over onigiri, it turns into an ochadzuke--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well…. Yeah, that’s true….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Onigiri with miso or with soy sauce smells and tastes so good~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Isn’t it better if you use broth instead of hot water? Also maybe add some sesame seeds or green onions?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeh!? A-, amazing, Maki-chan…. You’re a genius!! Let’s try it right away! I’ll get Rin-chan, so wait here-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait! I’m good, okay! Hey, Hanayo--!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
